name: Halloween Boo Catcher Free
description:
You must to collect a lot of candy and halloween objects.
Halloween - it's the most important holiday for everyone.
At this day it is possible to collect candy and enjoy the golden autumn.
But collect candy - it's not so easy.

You must bypass barriers and keep pace collect bonuses.
To pass one level you need at least one star.
Each level brings new surprises as well as new dangers.

The game has 3 seasons. The theme given to the first season - is the pumpkin.
Because a pumpkin - a symbol of Halloween.

The theme of the second season given the skull.
The skull is the second symbol of Halloween.

The theme of the third season, given the zombies.
Zombies - is a living dead.
A lot of people dress up in zombie in this holiday.
Especially good reviewed this theme in the cinema.

In this app:
* 30 levels
* 3 Seasons
* Cheerful mood
* A lot of joy
* Physical gameplay
* Holiday graphics
* FREE upgrades

Design by:
Anastasia Levchenko
Kate Shelling

Programmer:
Nikolay Smorgun

Sound By:
Anastasia Levchenko
